task.title: How to sign up for an excursion
task.shortdesc: We will be participating in the "Sail and Snorkel" excursion in Nassau, Bahamas. Follow the steps to sign up for the excursion.

step.cmd: Click on the "Explore" tab on the Carnival homepage.
Select "Browse by destination" and search Nassau.
Scroll through the available excursions to find the "Sail and Snorkel" excursion.
Select this excursion and follow the steps to register for March 5, 2017.
